channel.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
channel.description:
[img]https://media1.gameinformer.com/imagefeed/featured/ubisoft2013/blackflag/water610.jpg[/img] [url='https://www.gameinformer.com/games/assassins_creed_iv_black_flag/b/playstation4/archive/2013/03/04/assassin-39-s-creed-iv-black-flag-preview.aspx']https://www.gameinformer.com/games/assassins_creed_iv_black_flag/b/playstation4/archive/2013/03/04/assassin-39-s-creed-iv-black-flag-preview.aspx[/url]
So the next Assassin's Creed has already been announced.
You'll be playing Connor's grandfather Edward Kenway who's a assassin pirate, or something. You'll be able to meet all the badass pirates like Blackbeard and Calico Jack. The game is open-world, so you'll be able to take ships to different places of the Caribbean, the game will also feature naval warfare (well duh it IS a pirate game) akin to the ACIII mission, just more open.
EDIT: lol i just noticed i posted in help forum, could a mod please move it? Thanks.

item.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag

item.description:
Yeah, I just noticed I searched the help forums because of my stupidity. Thought there was none, please delete this thread, I am a stupid idiot.

Read full topic

item.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
https://www.gameinformer.com/games/assassins_creed_iv_black_flag/b/playstation4/archive/2013/03/04/assassin-39-s-creed-iv-black-flag-preview.aspx

So the next Assassin’s Creed has already been announced.

You’ll be playing Connor’s grandfather Edward Kenway who’s a assassin pirate, or something. You’ll be able to meet all the badass pirates like Blackbeard and Calico Jack.
The game is open-world, so you’ll be able to take ships to different places of the Caribbean, the game will also feature naval warfare (well duh it IS a pirate game) akin to the ACIII mission, just more open.
